name: jk-career-navigator
description: AI-powered career guidance platform for Jammu & Kashmir students

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd backend && npm ci && node server-enhanced.js
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build

author: Wajid Daud Tamboli
